description.plain:
Chloe Moriondo (born September 29, 2002) is a singer/songwriter from Michigan, USA. Chloe uses she/they pronouns, and primarily plays the ukulele and the guitar.

Chloe started her music career by posting covers to songs on her YouTube channel where her first original song, “Waves,” was posted. Her covers and original songs quickly got the attention of millions of viewers, such as Cavetown who she would later collaborate and tour with.

Her debut album, Rabbit Hearted., was released in July of 2018. Since then, she has released the EP Spirit Orb in April of 2020 as well as her first self-proclaimed “big kid” album Blood Bunny in May of 2021. In 2022, Moriondo released their third studio album, SUCKERPUNCH. True to its name, the album features hard-hitting tracks, as well as being her first foray into hyperpop following the indie pop of Blood Bunny.

Since the release of SUCKERPUNCH, Chloe has collaborated with the likes of Cavetown and Pierce The Veil, on albums worm food and The Jaws of Life respectively. In March 2023, they also released an original single, titled “Killbot!”, as part of Bose & NME’s C23 Mixtape.
